verses.name: Numbers 7:55
verses.text: His offering was one silver charger of the weight of an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:56
verses.text: One golden spoon of ten shekels, full of incense:

verses.name: Numbers 7:57
verses.text: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:58
verses.text: One kid of the goats for a sin offering:
